items.question: Is AppRevenue really free?
items.answer: Yes. AppRevenue is 100% free and open source. You self-host it on your own server, so there are no subscription costs.

items.question: What platforms are supported?
items.answer: We support AdMob (ad revenue), App Store Connect (iOS), Google Play Console (Android), and Stripe (payments and subscriptions).

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. All data is stored locally in your own SQLite database. Nothing is sent to third-party servers. Authentication uses industry-standard JWT.

items.question: Can I add multiple apps?
items.answer: Yes. You can track as many apps as you want. The dashboard shows a unified view and lets you filter by individual app.

items.question: How often is data collected?
items.answer: By default, data is collected daily at 6 AM via a cron job. You can also trigger manual collection at any time from the dashboard.
